verbose_text: Interestingly, treatment with the TGFbeta-1 antagonist SB431542 reduced muscle fiber cross-sectional area, muscle wet weight, and the percentage of the Pax7 + / MyoD1 + differentiating satellite cell population in the Den+ miR-206+ SB group compared with the Den+ miR-206 (XREF_FIG; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence: TGFbeta-1 antagonist SB431542 reduced muscle fiber cross-sectional area, muscle wet weight, and the percentage of the Pax7
